title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 368-2.1 - Purpose and applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 368-2.1 - Purpose and applicability

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to establish standards for
the labeling of mercury-added consumer products. This Subpart applies to any
person who sells or offers for sale any mercury-added consumer product in New

York State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
368-2.1

Adopted

New

York State Register February 23, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 08, eff. 3/10/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
